sentences.en: David is now living in Beirut again after an enforced absence.
sentences.cn: 戴维在被迫离开后，现在又回到了贝鲁特生活。

sentences.en: He excused his absence by saying that he was ill.
sentences.cn: 他说他生病了,为他缺席开脱.

sentences.en: He tried to justify his absence with lame excuses.
sentences.cn: 他想用站不住脚的借口为自己的缺席辩解.

sentences.en: He was disgruntled at their absence.
Her absence of mind during driving nearly caused an accident.
sentences.cn: 她驾车时心不在焉,几乎肇祸.

sentences.en: Her work involved repeated absences from home.
sentences.cn: 她的工作使她经常不在家。

sentences.en: In his absence I looked to see what was on his desk.
sentences.cn: 他不在时，我看了看他桌上有什么东西。

sentences.en: In our absence the office gossips are probably having a field day.
sentences.cn: 我们不在的时候，办公室里大概谣言四起了吧。

sentences.en: In the absence of any evidence, the police had to let Myers go.
sentences.cn: 警察没有证据，只好把迈尔斯放了。

sentences.en: John will act as a deputy for me during my absence.
sentences.cn: 我离开期间,约翰将代理我的职务.

sentences.en: Ms Leighton will be in charge during my absence (= while I am away ) .
sentences.cn: 我不在时，由莱顿女士负责。

sentences.en: No deduction in pay is made for absence due to illness.
Original mail returned in the absence of the addressee.
She promptly seized the opportunity his absence gave her.
sentences.cn: 她立即抓住了因他不在场给她创造的机会.

sentences.en: The absence of children at Christmas preyed on Liz's mind.
sentences.cn: 利兹因为圣诞节时孩子们不在而一直心神不宁。

sentences.en: The ostensible reason for his absence was illness.
The teacher demanded an explanation for his absence from class.
sentences.cn: 老师要他对缺课作出解释.
他们的缺席已经充分说明了问题。

sentences.en: There has been much gossip about the possible reasons for his absence.
sentences.cn: 关于他缺席的原因有很多传言。

words.tran_cn: 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的
旷工；旷课；有计划的怠工；经常无故缺席

phrases.phrase: absence makes the heart grow fonder

phrases.tran_cn: 缺乏，不存在；无…时，缺少…时

trans.tran_en: when you are not in the place where people expect you to be, or the time that you are away
